CREATE_PROVIDERS_IF_NOT_EXISTS:
CREATE TABLE  IF NOT EXISTS providers
             (id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, name text, description text)
CREATE_RANGES_IF_NOT_EXISTS:
CREATE TABLE  IF NOT EXISTS ranges
             (id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, cidr text, ip_version test, description text, provider text)
INSERT_RANGES: INSERT INTO ranges (id, cidr, description, ip_version, provider) values (null, :cidr, :description, :ip_version, :provider)
